CustomField.formula: (IF( ISBLANK( TEXT(Lead_Source__c ) ) , 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Marketing_Vendor__c ) , 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Campaign_Code__c ) , 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Campaign_Code_Description__c ) , 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( StartDate ) , 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( EndDate ) , 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Duration__c ) , 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( ActualCost ) , 0, 1) + IF( ISBLANK( TEXT( Status ) ), 0, 1)) / 9
CustomField.label: Campaign Data Quality Score
